response.job_title: MSc Cybersecurity | Technical Lead | Software development | Back-end | .NET | Infrastructure
response.summary:
MSc in information security. Computer and systems engineering professional. Technical leader and software developer.

I have designed, developed and supported software systems since 2015. I have also contributed in the area of infrastructure and DevOps in some companies.

I have mainly worked on projects with C# and ASP.NET, but I have also worked with native and hybrid Android mobile applications. I have also done personal projects related to Docker, Linux and computer networks.

Strengths to contribute, communicate and work as a team. Oriented to results and change.

Interested in joining a company where I can strengthen my current skills and be able to contribute to different solutions thanks to the experience gained.
response.skills: Microservicios, Bootstrap, xUnit, Postman, Jenkins, MongoDB, Java EE, Spring Boot, Angular, Git, Documentación, ASP.NET, DevOps, Azure DevOps, Scrum, Microsoft SQL Server, Spring Framework, AngularJS, Linux, Java

company.name: IT270 S.A.S.
company.description: IT270 SAS es una empresa que tiene como propósito general atender las necesidades de las personas y empresas en sus procesos de valor, a través del uso de tecnologías de última generación en sus unidades de negocio: Innovación en desarrollo de productos de Software y Hardware, Consultoría de innovación en procesos empresariales e innovación en gestión de riesgos, tecnología en salud y servicios en la nube.
